## Installation

You can install the released version of Pandora from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

```{r install-cran}
install.packages("Pandora")
```


You can install the development version of Pandora from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r install-dev}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Pandora-IsoMemo/pandora-data")
```

install.packages("Pandora")

library(Pandora)
